name: Meltylancer: Re-inforce
overview: MeltyLancer: Re-inforce is a sequel to MeltyLancer: Ginga Shoujo Keisatsu 2086 and takes place two years after, meaning in 2088. The core gameplay consists of isometric turn-based combat on one hand, and on visual novel and dating simulation style interaction with other characters. The player plays a young rookie transferred to a GPO (Galactic Police Organization) unit under Sylvie, the heroine from the previous game. The goal is to learn from the best and uphold the law.
